title: How to unsubscribe from Helsi+
description: Learn how to cancel your Helsi+ subscription. Follow these steps to manage your subscription and prevent future charges.

steps_1.title: Cancellation/Issue Resolution via Email
steps_1.description:
If you have issues with an order (incorrect or damaged items) or wish to cancel an order that hasn't shipped, follow these steps:

*   **Identify your Helsi service:** Determine if you are subscribed to Ukrainian medical service, red light therapy products, or general Helsi products.
*   **General Helsi Products (Unshipped Orders):** Email ecom@shophelsi.com to request a cancellation.
*   **Order Issues (Incorrect/Damaged Items):** Email ecom@shophelsi.com within 7 days of receipt, including your order number and pictures of the issue.
*   **Important Notes:**
    *   Orders that have already shipped cannot be changed or canceled.
    *   Red light therapy products do not offer returns or refunds for change-of-mind purchases.

steps_2.title: Subscription Cancellation via Google Play Store
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Helsi+ subscription through the Google Play Store, follow these steps:

*   Open the Google Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile icon at the top right.
*   Tap 'Payments & subscriptions' then 'Subscriptions'.
*   Select the Helsi+ subscription you want to cancel.
*   Tap 'Cancel subscription' and follow the instructions.

seo_text: Cancel your Helsi+ subscription quickly and easily. This guide provides step-by-step instructions to manage your Helsi+ subscription and avoid unwanted charges. Learn how to cancel through the Google Play Store.
